Title: WpfMetisControls
Description: Here will be published controls for image processing like splitting images, deskewing, finding content area.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Here will be published controls for image processing like splitting images, deskewing, finding content area.


I'm planning to publish here my controls. It will be 3 of them: Split Control, Deskew Control, Content control.

Split control:

Sample app:
Example.7z

Split control is providing opportunity to show/change middle line on image which contains two sub-images. This control is using three parameters: Middle, Theta (angle of the line), Size of the image (parameter is possibly redundant, maybe will be removed).

I hope that somebody will check my code for improvements or help with developing controls.
I've chosen great ZoomControl from http://wpfextensions.codeplex.com/ as base control for all my UserControls.
